name: Melder, Last of the Dead
text:
Stealth You control a darkness magic stone and your life is 2000 or less. (While this card is in your chant-standby area, you may play it without pay ing its cost when its Stealth condition is met.)
When this card enters your field, target resonator gains [-400/-400] for each resonator with Stealth you control until end of turn.
